hanzi-su-wiki:
宰

Значения

Руководить

Мнемоника

Дом 宀, где содержаться опасные преступники 辛, допрашивают которых начальники с правом судить и миловать.

убивать скот; управлять или править; обманывать клиентов; имперский чиновник в династическом Китае

主宰 [ zhǔ zǎi ]: to dominate; to rule; to dictate; master

heisig_chinese_memo: The Sichuan butcher house likes to stick chili peppers in the meat to make them more tasty.
heisig_constituent: superintend, house, spicy, stand up, vase, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: The superintendent of a Japanese school district needs a spicy relationship at home after watching girls in miniskirts all day.
koohiiStory2: The superintendent of an old-age house has to make sure the food is never too spicy.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your roof is spicy because you're the manager. You're always testing new recipes in your house to share with everyone who works under you, but that makes all the spice stick to your roof (since it doesn't have good ventilation like a restaurant or a lab would).
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself as the manager of a restaurant or a science lab. You have to test all of your managerial methods at home before you can bring them to work. And if you were to lick that roof of yours... it would be spicy from all of your experiments.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You've finally done it. You're now the manager of a bunch of spicy new cyborgs (さい). You've been toiling away for over a year, but you've finally replaced the cyborg you lost, and now you can manage them properly without anyone getting in the way.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Unfortunately, you couldn't figure out how to make non-spicy cyborgs, but that's okay because you're going to be the best cyborg manager ever! No one will ever take them away from you again.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 辛 (つらい、からい、シン горький, острый), 幸 (さいわい、しあわせ、コウ счастье, удача)
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 宀 (значок У), 立 (стоять), 辛 (острый на вкус)

zǎi: (графема) править, управлять; префект, министр (в феодальном Китае)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the spicy (辛) roof (宀) needs superintending
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The Sichuan butcher house likes to stick chili peppers in the meat to make them more tasty.
humanum_full_description_en:
A bronze inscription from " the Rock " from "䇂", "䇂" is " Yi in the beginning of the text" in the sense of governance, " the Rock " represents Shi Jia related to " slaughter " means governance Shi Jia things. This is consistent with Jin Wen Zhongzai's responsibility as a retainer to manage the affairs of the royal family (see Lejiao).

The character " Zai " changes from "䇂" but not " Xin ". The vertical stroke of "䇂" makes a curved shape, which is different from the vertical stroke of " Xin ". Later, it gradually became Xin-shaped. The old mistakenly thought that the word " Zai " was from Xin, so the explanation that the word " Zai " was in the form of slaughtering livestock under the house (Wu Qichang) was incorrect.

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as official names and place names, and the inscriptions are used as official names, responsible for managing the internal and external affairs of the Wang family, and conveying the orders of the palace (Zhang Yachu, Liu Yu).

"Said Wen": "Zai, the deacon in the house, Cong Li Cong Xin, Xin Li Ye.
humanum_short_description_en: A bronze inscription from " the Rock " from "䇂", "䇂" is " Yi in the beginning of the text" in the sense of governance, " the Rock " represents Shi Jia related to " slaughter " means governance Shi Jia things.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「宀」從「䇂」，「䇂」是「乂」的初文，有治理之義，「宀」表示與室家有關，「宰」表示治理室家之事。這與金文中宰作為家臣管理王家事務的職責相合(參樂郊)。

　　「宰」字從「䇂」不從「辛」，「䇂」下豎筆作彎曲形，與「辛」豎筆作直劃不同。後來才漸漸訛變為辛形。舊誤以為「宰」字從辛，故解釋「宰」字是在屋下屠殺牲畜之形(吳其昌)，不確。

　　甲骨文用作職官名和地名，金文用作職官名，負責管理王家內外事務，傳達宮中之命(張亞初、劉雨)。

　　《說文》：「宰，辠人在屋下執事者，從宀從辛，辛辠也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「宀」從「䇂」，「䇂」是「乂」的初文，有治理之義，「宀」表示與室家有關，「宰」表示治理室家之事。

The vertical stroke of " 䇂" makes a curved shape, which is different from the vertical stroke of " Xin". Later, it gradually became Xin-shaped. The old mistakenly thought that the word " Zai" was from Xin, so the explanation that the word " Zai" was in the form of slaughtering livestock under the house (Wu Qichang) was incorrect. The oracle bone inscriptions are used as official names and place names, and the inscriptions are used as official names, responsible for managing the internal and external affairs of the Wang family, and conveying the orders of the palace (Zhang Yachu, Liu Yu). 宰字的基本解释

宰
zǎi
杀牲畜：宰杀。屠宰。宰牲节（亦称“古尔邦节”、“牺牲节”）。
借指商贩用狡诈的手段使顾客在经济上受到损害（有的地区称“斩”）。
古代官名：宰相（xi刵g ）。宰辅。太宰。宰官。
主管、主持：主宰。宰制。
杀

宰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǎi］
［《廣韻》作亥切，上海，精。］
(1)古代奴隶主家中掌管家务的奴隶或奴隶总管。《仪礼·公食大夫礼》：“宰右執鐙，左執蓋。”郑玄注：“宰謂太宰，宰夫之長也。”《韩非子·说难》：“伊尹爲宰，百里奚爲虜，皆所以干其上也。”一说，宰为手工业奴隶。参阅范文澜蔡美彪等《中国通史》第一编第二章第一节。
(2)古代官吏的通称。《周礼》有冢宰、大宰、小宰、宰夫、内宰、里宰。春秋卿大夫的家臣和采邑的长官，也都称宰。《公羊传·隐公元年》：“宰者何？官也。”后世亦以宰为对官吏的敬称。
(3)主宰；治理。
(4)屠宰；杀牲。
(5)分割；切割。
(6)坟墓。
(7)姓。春秋时有宰予。见《史记·仲尼弟子列传》。

宰字的英文翻译

◎ 宰
butcher, govern, slaughter

宰字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宰； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页286第04
〔古文〕???【唐韻】作亥切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】子亥切，?哉上聲。【說文】官稱。【玉篇】治也。【增韻】主也。【周禮·天官】立天官冢宰，使帥其屬掌邦治。【註】冢，大也。又大宰，掌建邦之六典，以佐王治邦國。【註】大宰，治官之長，兼總六官也。大宰之副貳曰小宰。又有宰夫之職，掌治朝之法。【鄭註】宰夫，主諸臣萬民之復逆，故詩人重之，曰家伯維宰。　又【周禮·地官】有里宰，掌比其邑之衆寡，與其六畜兵器。　又家臣之長曰宰。【詩·小雅】諸宰君婦。【註】諸宰，家宰也。　又【廣韻】制也。【正字通】爲事物主也。【史記·禮書】宰制萬物，役使羣動。【荀子·正名篇】心者，道之主宰。　又屠也，烹也。主膳羞者曰膳宰，亦曰庖宰。【前漢·?平傳】里中社，平爲宰。平曰：使平得宰天下，亦如此肉。【顏師古註】主切割肉也。又姓。周大夫宰孔之後，以官爲氏，周宰咺，漢宰直。又宰父，複姓。　又叶子里切，音擠。【詩·大雅】疚哉冢宰。叶紀止里。　又【說文】宰辠，人在屋下執事者。从宀从辛。辛，辠也。

宰字的源字形

宰字的起名意思

杀牲畜，割肉；主管，主持：主宰；古代官名：宰相。

Basic explanation of words
slaughter
zǎi
Killing livestock: slaughter. slaughter. Eid al Adha (also known as "Gurban Festival", "Sacrifice Festival").
It refers to the fact that vendors use cunning means to harm customers financially (in some areas it is called "cutting").
Ancient official name: Prime Minister (xi刵g). Zaisuke. Dazai. Zaiguan.
Supervisor, chair: dominate. Dominate.
kill
slaughter
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǎi］
["Guangyun" made Haiqie, Shanghai, Jing. ]
(1) The slaves or slave masters who were in charge of housework in the homes of ancient slave owners. "Rituals and Public Food Doctors Ceremony": "Zai right holds the stirrup, and the left holds the cover." Zheng Xuan's note: "Zai is the Dazai, and the husband is the elder." As a captive, everyone is doing it.” In one word, slaughter is a slave to the handicraft industry. See Fan Wenlan, Cai Meibiao and other "General History of China", Chapter Two, Section One.
(2) The general term for ancient officials. "Zhou Li" has mound zai, big zai, small zai, zai fu, inner zai, and lizai. The retainers of Dr. Chunqiuqing and the chiefs of Feiyi are also called slayers. "The First Year of Gongyang Zhuan·Yin AD": "Who is the slaughter? Officials." Later generations will also use zai as a respect for officials.
(3) Domination; governance.
(4) Slaughtering; killing animals.
(5) Divide; cut.
(6) Tomb.
(7) Last name. There is Zaiyu in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Historical Records · Biography of Zhongni's Disciples".
slaughter

zǎi
I сущ.
1) канцлер, министр; правитель, глава; начальник
子游为武城宰 Цзы-ю стал правителем Учэна
万民之宰 повелитель всего народа
2) распорядитель (напр. обряда) ; домоправитель; шеф (напр. по кухне)
II гл.
1) резать, убивать (скот)
杀猪宰羊 заколоть свинью и зарезать барана
2) править, стоять во главе
宰天下 управлять Поднебесной
3) обдирать; надувать
宰客 надуть клиента покупателя
宰他一顿 заставить его пригласить в дорогой ресторан и оплатить
III собств.
Цзай (фамилия)
Radicals: 宀, 辛  (roof, spicy)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your roof is spicy because you're the manager. You're always testing new recipes in your house to share with everyone who works under you, but that makes all the spice stick to your roof (since it doesn't have good ventilation like a restaurant or a lab would).
Picture yourself as the manager of a restaurant or a science lab. You have to test all of your managerial methods at home before you can bring them to work. And if you were to lick that roof of yours... it would be spicy from all of your experiments.
Reading Mnemonic
You've finally done it. You're now the manager of a bunch of spicy new cyborgs (さい). You've been toiling away for over a year, but you've finally replaced the cyborg you lost, and now you can manage them properly without anyone getting in the way.
Unfortunately, you couldn't figure out how to make non-spicy cyborgs, but that's okay because you're going to be the best cyborg manager ever! No one will ever take them away from you again.
